summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were higher on Friday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 17
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were higher on Friday, with 16 gaining and two declining.
Bitcoin rose 7% to $26,774 by market close.
